Name: Nessie cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
5 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist curled to resemble Nessie.
Review: A Rob Roy (Scotch Manhattan) with walnut liqueur and Pedro Ximénez sherry.
History: Created in January 2015 by yours truly in tribute to the Loch Ness Monster, a.k.a. Nessie, who reputedly inhabits Loch Ness in the Scottish Highlands.
Nutrition: One serving of Nessie cocktail contains 176 calories
